headline: Digital Realty (DLR): Evaluating Valuation as It Expands AI-Optimized Data Centers and Oracle Connectivity in Singapore
summary: Digital Realty Trust (DLR) just doubled down on AI infrastructure, pouring capital into retrofitting its legacy sites and rolling out new AI ready data centers alongside fresh Oracle connectivity in Singapore. See our latest analysis for Digital Realty Trust. The latest AI and cloud moves come after a choppy stretch, with a 1 year total shareholder return of minus 9.89 percent but a strong 3 year total shareholder return of 69.08 percent, suggesting long term momentum is still intact even as...

headline: AI Data Centers are Booming and These 3 Stocks Are Cashing In
summary: The artificial intelligence boom will continue to create massive demand for data centers. Right now, according to MIT Technology Review, there are about 3,000 data centers across the U.S. Plus, according to a report from McKinsey, $5.2 trillion in AI infrastructure investments will be needed by 2030. McKinsey’s analysis also “suggests that demand for AI-ready ... AI Data Centers are Booming and These 3 Stocks Are Cashing In

headline: What Analysts Think Is Changing the Story for Digital Realty Trust Now
summary: Digital Realty Trust’s fair value estimate has been nudged higher to about $199.22 per share as analysts grow slightly more optimistic about its long term growth prospects and lower the discount rate to roughly 7.82%, reflecting improved confidence in the durability of future cash flows. With the revenue growth forecast also ticking up to around 12.98%, recent Street commentary points to strong demand visibility and resilient data center fundamentals as key supports for the updated targets...

headline: Digital Realty Announces Access to Oracle Cloud Infrastructure in Singapore via FastConnect
summary: SINGAPORE, Dec. 07, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Digital Realty (NYSE: DLR), the largest global provider of cloud- and carrier-neutral data center, colocation, and interconnection solutions and an Oracle Partner, today announced it will offer connectivity to an Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI) FastConnect point-of-presence (PoP) within the Oracle Cloud Singapore West Region. In addition to the new connectivity, Digital Realty is also making an Oracle Solution Center available in Singapore through i
